comment: The set of neighbors of a vertex in a hypergraph. This version of ~ nbgrval (with ` N ` being an arbitrary set instead of being a vertex) only holds for classes whose edges are subsets of the set of vertices (hypergraphs!). (Contributed by AV, 26-Oct-2020.) (Proof shortened by AV, 15-Nov-2020.)
